channel.title: Ride of a Lifetime on Rob's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Ride of a Lifetime on Rob's Notes

item.title: The Ride of a Lifetime
item.description: “Optimism in a leader, especially in challenging times, is so vital. Pessimism leads to paranoia, which leads to defensiveness, which leads to risk aversion. Optimism sets a different machine in motion.
